Phrase_Generator

Class PhraseGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • Phrase_Generator.Generator
      • Phrase_Generator.PhraseGenerator

  • public class PhraseGenerator
extends Generator
    The Phrase_Generator class is used to generate musical phrases based on a given grammar structure

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static PhraseGenerator getInstance()
        Returns:
        the singleton instance of this class

      • constructMonophonicPhrase

        public EventStream constructMonophonicPhrase(GrammarContainer grammar)
        Constructs a monophonic phrase based on the input grammar structure
        Parameters:
        grammar - the grammar structure for use in constructing the phrase
        Returns:
        an EventStream containing a monophonic phrase solution, or null if no solution could be found

      • constructMonophonicPhrasePairs

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Double,EventStream> constructMonophonicPhrasePairs(GrammarContainer grammar)
        Constructs a monophonic phrase from the given input grammar.
        Parameters:
        grammar - the grammatical structure to be used in generating the melody
        Returns:
        an EventStream containing a monophonic phrase that fits the grammatical structure. Return null if no phrase can be constructed from the grammar
